description: This Java class 'LocalHostServiceHandle' extends the 'ServiceHandle' class and provides an implementation for services running on the local host, including methods to identify whether the service is on the same process, local host, or remote host.

classes.name: LocalHostServiceHandle
classes.description: A ServiceHandle implementation representing a service running on the local host, with specific behaviors for process and host identification.

methods.name: LocalHostServiceHandle
methods.description: Constructor initializing with name, ipc, and event parameters.

methods.name: LocalHostServiceHandle
methods.description: Constructor initializing with name, ipc, event, and visibility parameters.

methods.name: isSameProcess
methods.description: Overrides ServiceHandle method to indicate this service is not on the same process (returns false).

methods.name: isLocalHost
methods.description: Overrides ServiceHandle method to indicate this service is on the local host (returns true).

methods.name: isRemoteHost
methods.description: Overrides ServiceHandle method to indicate this service is not remote (returns false).
